title: 74 — 13 "The Devilish Candle! Tears of Regret and Tears of Anger!"Transliteration: "Ma no Cyandoru! Munen no Namida to Okari no Namida" (Japanese:魔のキャンドル! 無念の涙と怒りの涙) Kōnosuke Uda Junki Takegami 315.6 July 15, 2001(2001-07-15)[126] —
